summary: This bill mandates audits of higher education institutions to assess compliance with the Higher Education Act's reporting requirements on foreign gifts and contracts. It directs the Department of Education to conduct regular audits, prioritizing institutions with large endowments, histories of foreign funding, and other specified criteria. The bill also imposes excise taxes on institutions receiving funding from foreign countries of concern and on those failing to report foreign funding, with specific penalties outlined. The Secretary of Education must report the audit results to Congress, making the information publically available.
